APPS.Wiki.Title: Combat Utility Belt Wiki
SETTINGS.CUBPuter.ButtonH: Provides additional configuration for Combat Utility Belt
SETTINGS.Concentrator.EnableH: (Tested in D&D5e only)(Requires Enhanced Conditions) Forces concentration checks on tokens with the concentrating status effect when they take damage
SETTINGS.Concentrator.ConditionNameH: Name of the Condition to use for adding and checking for Concentration
SETTINGS.Concentrator.OutputToChatH: Display a message in chat whenever concentration is threatened
SETTINGS.Concentrator.PromptRollH: Prompt the player to make the check or not
SETTINGS.Concentrator.ConcentrationAttri: Concentration Attribute name as defined by game system
SETTINGS.Concentrator.HealthAttributeH: Health/HP attribute name as defined by game system
SETTINGS.Concentrator.AutoConcentrateH: When a Concentration spell is cast, automatically set the Concentrating status
SETTINGS.Concentrator.NotifyDoubleH: Send a message when a Concentration spell is cast while another spell is being Concentrated on
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.CoreIconsH: A copy of the core status icons
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.SystemH: A reference to the game system. Defaults to other if not known to the module
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.OutputCombat: On each round of Combat, output any conditions for the current combatant to chat
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.DefaultMapsH: Module-provided maps of conditions to icons
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.RemoveDefaul: Remove existing status effect icons from token HUD
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.MapTypeH: Condition map type currently in use -- default, custom or other
SETTINGS.GiveXP.EnableH: Adds an option at the end of combat to automatically distribute xp from the combat to the players
SETTINGS.HideNames.EnableH: Hides NPC names in the Combat Tracker
SETTINGS.HideNames.ReplacementStringH: Text to display for hidden NPC names
SETTINGS.HideNames.HideFooterH: When NPC names are hidden, also hide the chat card footer which can contain sensitive information
SETTINGS.MightySummoner.EnableH: (Tested in D&D5e only) Automatically check to see if token owner of NEUTRAL actor also owns an actor with the Mighty Summoner feat. Automatically calculates and adds new HP formula and rolls HP for token on canvas drop
SETTINGS.MightySummoner.FeatNameH: Name of the feat to check for
SETTINGS.PanSelect.EnablePanH: Enables the following token panning functionality
SETTINGS.PanSelect.PanGMH: Pans GM. Options: None (do not pan GM), NPC (pan only to non-player character tokens), All (pan to all tokens)
SETTINGS.PanSelect.PanPlayersH: Pans players. Options: None (do not pan players), Owner (pan only to Owned tokens), Observer (pan to Observed AND Owned tokens), All (pan to all tokens)
SETTINGS.PanSelect.EnableSelectH: Enables the following token select functionality
SETTINGS.PanSelect.SelectGMH: Selects token based on selected option: None (do not select), NPC (select only non-player character tokens), All (select all tokens)
SETTINGS.PanSelect.SelectPlayersH: Selects Player-owned tokens on their turn in combat
SETTINGS.PanSelect.ObserverDeselectH: Deselect controlled tokens on any non-Owned combatant's turn
SETTINGS.RerollInitiative.EnableH: 在每轮开始时，为所有参战者重骰先攻
SETTINGS.RerollInitiative.RerollTempComb: 为临时参战者重骰先攻
如果临时参战者被启用，决定是否为他们重骰先攻
SETTINGS.TemporaryCombatants.EnableH: 允许在战斗列表中加入临时的战斗人员
SETTINGS.ActorUtility.InitiativeFromShee: 启用从Enable Roll Initiative from sheet
Creates a clickable link on the Initiative heading in some Actor sheets
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.AutoRollHostileHpH: 当token被加入地图中时，随机骰出其生命值。
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.TokenEffectSizeH: Sets the size for token effect icons on the token. Default: Small
